summary: This document is an email sent by Jeffrey Epstein to undisclosed recipients, requesting confidential treatment regarding information related to JPMorgan Chase. The email indicates a level of communication and potential dealings involving Epstein and the financial institution.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating his involvement in matters related to JPMorgan Chase.

keyFacts: The email was sent on July 22, 2009.
The subject of the email indicates a request for confidential treatment.
The email involves JPMorgan Chase, suggesting a financial context.
